Orlando Mercado

* Position

Posted on
[March 23, 2016](https://glotwp.com/employee/orlando-mercado/ "Orlando Mercado")
by
webdevral

Orlando Mercado has been a resident of Gloucester Township since 1999 and a member of Council since 2004. Mr. Mercado received his Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing from Stockton University and his Master of Arts Degree in Business Administration from Temple University. He is an Administrator within the Gloucester Township Public School district and an Adjunct Business Professor at Camden County College. Mr. Mercado’s personal time is dedicated to raising his son, Alex, and coaching Tball with him in the Blackwood Kiwanis Little League. An avid runner, most days he can be seen running throughout the Township training for his next marathon.

‹
[Michael Mignone](https://glotwp.com/employee/michael-mignone/)

[David R. Mayer](https://glotwp.com/employee/david-mayer/)
